DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that dutogliptin/PHX1149T is safe and tolerable.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Extension Study to Evaluate the Safety of Dutogliptin/PHX1149T in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Completed Visit 7/Day 98 of the core protocol PHX1149PROT202 Current treatment of Type 2 diabetes mellitus in accordance with product labeling with metformin, or thiazolidinedione (TZD), or metformin + TZD Inadequately controlled Type 2 diabetes mellitus with need for therapy with insulin
